Security Management System (hereinafter - EPAM ISMS) is a subsystem of EPAM QMS which is presented by a set of EPAM regulations for systematic management of Company's sensitive data.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Achieving information security requires risk management against physical, Policy, Information Security and Privacy Policy\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The key EPAM QMS documents are Quality Policy and Information Security and Privacy Policy. These policies represent the commitments made by the top management with respect to quality and information security and provide a framework for setting objectives.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Quality Policy\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM has established, implemented, and maintains a QMS with the goal of achieving customer satisfaction continually by understanding and fulfilling expectations and needs of our customers.  \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Learn more about the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://epam.sharepoint.com/sites/policy/SitePages/Policy/Corporate Governance Policies/Quality Policy.aspx\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Quality Policy\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" in EPAM Ethics and Compliance Library (ECL).\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Information Security and Privacy Policy\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM is dedicated to protecting all managed information assets by using its ISAE 3402, ISO/IEC 27001:2013 and ISO/IEC 27701:2019 compliant Information Security Management System to meet current information security challenges and comply with laws and contractual obligations.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Learn more about the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://epam.sharepoint.com/sites/policy/SitePages/Policy/Corporate Governance Policies/Information Security and Privacy Policy.aspx\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Information Security and Privacy Policy\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" in ECL.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Why is QMS important for you? \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Owing to adherence to QMS, you work in the Company and in a project according to requirements known in advance. You can easily adapt yourself regardless of the previous   project you have been involved in.\\nDocumented EPAM regulations allow solving issues with the help of accumulated experience of other teams. Project documentation helps avoid keeping large amount of information in mind and find necessary things rather quickly. You can fulfill project tasks, solve arising problems and plan your activities much easier. Misunderstandings and probability of miscommunication in a project and with a Customer decrease significantly, improving the emotional atmosphere in a team and resulting in job satisfaction.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Successful functioning of ISMS is important to protect information assets, allowing the organization to:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"a) achieve assurance that information assets are adequately protected against information security risks on a continual basis;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"b) maintain a structured and comprehensive framework for identifying and assessing information security risks, selecting and applying applicable controls, and measuring and improving their effectiveness;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"c) continually improve control environment;\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"d) effectively achieve legal and regulatory compliance\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Successful functioning of QMS LSH is important for both the Project and Customer to ensure that medical device related services consistently meet customer and applicable regulatory requirements. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Why do you need to know this? \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To understand how EPAM operates, where to find necessary information and, in case Customer asks you whether EPAM has got QMS, to be able to respond positively. In some instances, clients turn to other companies because they want assurance that their money will not be wasted. QMS is a set of interrelated elements that define rules of the game.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Why do we need to keep documentation?\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The bigger the company,  the harder it is to organize its operations and manage all the projects.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In a small company formalized procedures are pointless: employees can discuss all the issues and make plans over a cup of coffee.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"When the number of people increases, informal communication becomes insufficient. As a result, necessary project information is difficult to obtain, deadlines are missed and product/service quality declines.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"What if QMS is not established or ignored?\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"“Who submitted this bug?!” – Unknown.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"A lot of time is spent on reworking functionality that has already been implemented, this is because the process is not traceable. Building of a product turns into an uncontrolled process when code is not under version control.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To avoid such problems, it is important for a global company to establish corporate management system.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Therefore, EPAM QMS is indispensable.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you have any questions about this section, please contact your Manager or contact us through\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://support.epam.com/esp/ess.do?orderitem=caQMSSupportRequestsTrainingSupportRequest#complete\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"QMS Training Support\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
